transactions.name: Apple Inc.
transactions.description: Technology company known for iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Apple Watch

transactions.name: Airbnb
transactions.description: Online marketplace for lodging, primarily homestays for vacation rentals, and tourism activities

transactions.name: PayPal
transactions.description: Online payments system that supports online money transfers and serves as an electronic alternative to traditional paper methods like checks and money orders

transactions.name: Google LLC
transactions.description: Multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products, including online advertising technologies, search, cloud computing, software, and hardware

transactions.name: Amazon.com, Inc.
transactions.description: Multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence

transactions.name: Spotify
transactions.description: Digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs

transactions.name: YouTube, LLC
transactions.description: Video-sharing platform where users can watch, like, share, comment, and upload their own videos

transactions.name: Vimeo, Inc.
transactions.description: Video hosting, sharing, and services platform focused on high-definition video quality

transactions.name: Uber Technologies, Inc.
transactions.description: Ride-sharing and transportation network company offering taxi, food delivery, and other services

transactions.name: Atlassian
transactions.description: Software company that develops products for software developers, project managers, and content management

transactions.name: Waze Mobile
transactions.description: GPS navigation software that provides turn-by-turn information and user-submitted travel times and route details

transactions.name: Medium Corporation
transactions.description: Online publishing platform where users can post articles, stories, and essays for a community of readers

transactions.name: Shopify Inc.
transactions.description: E-commerce platform for online stores and retail point-of-sale systems

transactions.name: United Parcel Service (UPS)
transactions.description: Package delivery and supply chain management company

transactions.name: Dropbox, Inc.
transactions.description: File hosting service that offers cloud storage, file synchronization, personal cloud, and client software

transactions.name: Pinterest, Inc.
transactions.description: Image sharing and social media service designed to enable saving and discovery of information on the web using images, animated GIFs, and videos

transactions.name: Visa Inc.
transactions.description: Global payments technology company working to enable consumers, businesses, banks, and governments to use digital currency

transactions.name: Sony Interactive Entertainment
transactions.description: Video game and digital entertainment company, known for the PlayStation brand of gaming consoles

transactions.name: Microsoft Corporation
transactions.description: Technology corporation known for its software products like Windows OS, Office Suite, and the Xbox gaming console

transactions.name: Upwork Inc.
transactions.description: Global freelancing platform where businesses and independent professionals connect and collaborate remotely
